by  Nate GotliebPublished  January  

The NCAA announced Monday that Minneapolis is among the eight finalists to host the  mens Final Fours PERIOD

The games would be played at the new 65000seat Vikings stadium set to open in  PERIOD Minneapolis hosted two Final Fours at the Metrodome the most recent in  PERIOD

The announcement came on the same day Gov PERIOD Mark Dayton launched a campaign to bring the  Super Bowl to the new stadium PERIOD

The NCAA will announce the results of the bids in November PERIOD
